text: Sabe bek teuwo keu nikmat Allah Taingat nikmat Neubri keu gata Janji ngon gata masa nyang sudah Watee nyan takheun kamoe deungo that Lom kamoe taÊ»at turot peurintah Teuma takwa gata keu Tuhan â€˜Eleumee Tuhan leupah that luah Peue nyang lam dada bandum Neuteupue Hana meusapeue pih na meuilah
